name: 8-Week HIIT Accelerator
description: An intensive 8-week high-intensity interval program designed to maximize VO2max improvements. Based on scientific protocols that show optimal adaptations occur with structured periodization over 8 weeks. Includes an activation phase, progressive build phases targeting both density and intensity, a peak phase for maximum output, and a strategic taper for adaptation realization.
author: CardioKinetic

weeks.description: Neural activation and movement pattern establishment. Low intensity, focus on technique.
Aerobic base development. Building the foundation for intensity work.
Increasing work density. Maintaining power while reducing rest periods.
Peak density phase. Work intervals now equal to rest intervals.
Power progression begins. Now pushing for higher wattage output.
Peak power development. High intensity with aggressive work:rest ratio.
Maximum output week. Give everything you have. This is the climax.
Active recovery and adaptation realization. Reduced volume, maintain some intensity.
